PROMPT(1)                         Msh Manual                         PROMPT(1)

NAME
       prompt - msh's prompt

SYNOPSIS
       prompt

DESCRIPTION
       Msh’s prompt is set via this method.

           λ echo #{def prompt; "$ "; end}
           prompt
           $ ...

MSH
       Part of msh(1).

Msh v0.2.0                        2020-06-01                         PROMPT(1)
